name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with over 10 years of experience specializing in **Python**, **Django**, and **Flask** frameworks, alongside a robust proficiency in relational databases such as **Postgres** and **MSSQL**. Adept in utilizing **Git** for version control, enhancing collaboration, and maintaining code quality. Demonstrated leadership skills with a focus on effective communication, driving team success and delivering high-performance software solutions in complex environments.
Proficient in developing scalable backend systems and implementing secure, maintainable applications that meet industry standards. Experienced in building cloud-native applications and managing the full development lifecycle, ensuring seamless integration and efficient deployment strategies. Committed to leveraging technical expertise to contribute to innovative solutions that have a tangible impact.
